snippet.title: True Beauty Gameplay
snippet.description:
True Beauty Gameplay is A 1-on-1 Stylish Puzzle Matching Game .

❤️Seojun v Suho! Real-time head-to-head puzzle battles
- Pop the blocks by matching 3 of the same
- For more thrills, opponents are matched with you based on your tier

❤️The more you play, the more styles get popped!
- Get more BEAUTY-ful and powerful skill cards as you progress
- Customize your favorite characters with all-new costumes only available in the game

❤️Who is this Suho from New York? Challenge him in the Global Battle Mode
- Enjoy global tournaments with puzzle masters from all over the world
- Become the national representative for The True Beauty Championship

❤️Change up the whole game with unexpected twists and tactics
- Turn the table on your opponent with different rules and items for each League
- Seasonal Leagues feature limited-time grand rewards

Google Play download URL:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lico.truebeauty

iOS Games (iPhone - iPad - iPod Touch) :
App Store Link : https://apps.apple.com/app/id1636828517



Thanks for watching True Beauty gameplay and if you love True Beauty review , please leave a comment for more content like this .
